## Data

### Disable auto save and restore workspace!

1. Tools
2. GLobal Options
3. ![Set save to Never and uncheck restore...](figures/rdata.PNG)


This is not recommended!
```{r data}
x <- 1
y <- 2
save.image()
```



This is better
```{r data_better}
x <- 1
y <- 2
saveRDS(x, "data/x.rds")
saveRDS(y, "data/y.rds")
```
